title: Mobile Mathematics Instructional Design Course for Promoting Learning Independence

context.prior_knowledge: College-level basic mathematics and statistics knowledge
context.additional_context: A 3-Step Instructional Method for Enhancing Learning Autonomy in a Smartphone-Based Mobile Environment: Applied to Mathematics Courses

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher in self-directed learning planning and execution skills by Week 2
Learners independently perform mathematical problem-solving scenarios in mobile environments at 70% or higher by Week 3
Learners score at least 60 points (out of 100) on the 3-level learning independence assessment tool by course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
